Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.hybris.cis.fedex.converter.AbstractFedexConverter
    currently not in use anymore
    com.hybris.cis.fedex.converter.ShippingRateConverter
    currently not in use anymore
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.hybris.cis.api.subscription.service.SubscriptionService.cancelSubscription(CisSubscriptionCancelSubscriptionRequest)
    As of release 5.2, use SubscriptionService.cancelSubscription(String, String) instead
    com.hybris.cis.client.rest.subscription.SubscriptionClient.cancelSubscription(String, CisSubscriptionCancelSubscriptionRequest)
    As of release 5.2, use SubscriptionClient.cancelSubscription(String, String, String) instead
    com.hybris.cis.api.subscription.service.SubscriptionService.changePaymentMethod(CisChangePaymentMethodRequest)
    As of release 5.2, use SubscriptionService.updatePaymentMethod(CisPaymentMethodUpdateRequest) instead
    com.hybris.cis.client.rest.subscription.SubscriptionClient.changePaymentMethod(String, CisChangePaymentMethodRequest)
    As of release 5.2, use SubscriptionClient.updatePaymentMethod(String, com.hybris.cis.api.subscription.model.CisPaymentMethodUpdateRequest) instead
    com.hybris.cis.web.resource.fraud.OrderStatusUpdatesResource.getOrderStatusUpdateText(String, String)
    com.hybris.cis.canadapost.common.CanadaPostClientImpl.getPdfLabel(String)
    use getPdfLabelAsStream
    com.hybris.cis.api.shipping.model.CisShipment.getServiceLevel()
    Use serviceMethod instead
    com.hybris.cis.api.subscription.model.CisSubscriptionData.getSubscriptionRenewalType()
    As of release 5.2, replaced by CisSubscriptionData.getAutoRenewal()
    com.hybris.cis.api.subscription.model.CisSubscriptionData.getVendorParameters()
    Use CisResult.getVendorResponses() together with CisResult.setVendorResponses(AnnotationHashMap) instead.
    com.hybris.cis.api.subscription.service.SubscriptionService.post(CisSubscriptionOrderPostRequest)
    As of release 5.2, use SubscriptionService.createSubscription(com.hybris.cis.api.subscription.model.CisSubscriptionCreateRequest) instead
    com.hybris.cis.client.rest.subscription.SubscriptionClient.postSubscription(String, CisSubscriptionOrderPostRequest)
    As of release 5.2, use SubscriptionClient.createSubscription(java.lang.String, com.hybris.cis.api.subscription.model.CisSubscriptionCreateRequest) instead
    com.hybris.cis.api.subscription.service.SubscriptionService.replaceSubscriptionPaymentMethod(CisSubscriptionReplacePaymentMethodRequest)
    As of release 5.2, use SubscriptionService.replaceSubscriptionPaymentMethod(String, String, String) instead
    com.hybris.cis.client.rest.subscription.SubscriptionClient.replaceSubscriptionPaymentMethod(String, CisSubscriptionReplacePaymentMethodRequest)
    As of release 5.2, use SubscriptionClient.replaceSubscriptionPaymentMethod(String, String, String, String) instead
    com.hybris.cis.persistence.service.GeolocationService.saveGeolocation(String, String, String)
    com.hybris.cis.api.subscription.model.CisTermsOfService.setBillingTime(String)
    as of version 5.2 use CisTermsOfService.setBillingFrequency(String) instead.
    com.hybris.cis.api.shipping.model.CisShipment.setServiceLevel(CisShippingServiceLevel)
    Use serviceMethod instead
    com.hybris.cis.api.subscription.model.CisSubscriptionData.setSubscriptionRenewalType(String)
    As of release 5.2, replaced by CisSubscriptionData.setAutoRenewal(Boolean)
    com.hybris.cis.api.subscription.model.CisSubscriptionData.setVendorParameters(AnnotationHashMap)
    Use CisResult.setVendorResponses(AnnotationHashMap) inherited from CisResult instead.
